Question
========

In regression analysis, the predicted score on y is the average of the response variable y when

Answerlist
----------

* B = 1
* R = 0
* X = 0

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* B = 1: Incorrect
* R = 0: Correct
* X = 0: Incorrect
